publ: by Gomathy Shankaran (DBA Kidz Learn Applications)
name: Netknowledgetrivia
0:
”Alexa, open knowledge trivia”
”ask me a question”
”repeat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: knowledge trivia
des:
Net knowledge trivia is a trivia game on general knowledge with in-app computers. This quiz has a set of 15 and 30 questions from the 2 categories - General Knowledge, and Computers. The general knowledge questions are free and the user can keep playing as long as one wishes to. The general knowledge category has questions from planets, celebrity pets, countries, sports and literature.
User has the option to purchase the category "Computers" which has 30 questions.. 
Net knowledge trivia gives interesting and sometimes fun facts.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
